name: FrogLight
description:
FrogLight is a game about a man who had died and awakened as a frog in a new, weird world. The main task - to light up the Lanterns!
The Lanterns unlock the doors to the next chambers. Maybe... someday he’ll find the exit from this cave?
 

Story:

I died in that stupid world, to be forgotten. The end. ...
But was it really the end?

They say that after it ends, there’s nothing, dark so dark.
They were right.
 

For a minute.
 

Oh, of course they didn't know.
There is another way of life, after death.

“An end is a new beginning”
 

Because when he has awoken, he has found himself slimmer and smaller.

How? Why am I a frog now? Who I was?

I don’t remember.
I could be Floppy, i always loved this name...
A cave?

Lastly, there is this stick on fire, it never extinguishes. Oh, and there are Lanterns that change color when lit up, hmm… weird doors.

Well then, let’s go! There's no time to waste!

Credits: Made by Elemental and wrappedinburrito for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023

Music by Attic Ella http://beta.ccmixter.org/people/Levihica

Sounds by remaxim (CC BY-SA 3.0)
